title: Comment from National Employment Law Project

analysis.key_quote: For these reasons, we urge rejection of this proposed rule. It will gut effective enforcement of the laws Congress has passed to protect people’s rights in all walks of life, including employment.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule, highlighting concerns about the potential politicization of civil service and the erosion of protections for workers' rights, which aligns with the indicators of opposition.
